org.fcrepo.http.api

Class FedoraContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.http.commons.AbstractResource
      • org.fcrepo.http.api.FedoraContent

  • @Component
@Scope(value="prototype")
public class FedoraContent
extends AbstractResource
    Content controller for adding, reading, and manipulating binary streams
